mapper.select: SELECT `xt_appkey_appsecret_id`, `xt_appkey`, `xt_appsecret`, DATE_FORMAT(`xt_ctime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_ctime`, DATE_FORMAT(`xt_mtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_mtime`, `xt_userinfo_id`, `xt_appkey_appsecret_status`, `xt_appkey_appsecret_name`, `xt_appkey_appsecret_remark` FROM xt_appkey_appsecret WHERE xt_appkey_appsecret_id=#{xt_appkey_appsecret_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM xt_appkey_appsecret WHERE xt_appkey_appsecret_id IN
#{item}
